title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Take Part in Art
body: Take Part in Art        A young artist Takes Part in Art! Photo by Alex Vonkleydorff          Be Creative - Be Inspired - Take Part in Art Visitors have the opportunity to experience first-hand the fun of plein air painting and sketching, while becoming a part of a unique and enduring artistic tradition. Art supplies, provided by the National Park Service, allow visitors to capture a view of the park, which they are invited to keep. To see visitor artwork, click here. Bring your friends and family and discover what Julian Alden Weir described as "that wonderful something that the landscape in nature suggests...."      May - October Schedule       Wednesday   Thursday   Friday   Saturday   Sunday    10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Colored Pencils & Pastels  Colored Pencils & Pastels  Colored Pencils & Pastels  Watercolors Watercolors
